TOKENATTACHER.error.NoActiveGMFound: 활성화된 GM을 찾을 수 없습니다! 연결된 개체가 올바르게 업데이트 되지 않았습니다. 토큰을 이전 위치로 옮기고 GM에게 문의하세요.
TOKENATTACHER.error.ExportAllowsOnlyActo: 액터 개요 만 Token Attacher를 통해 내보낼 수 있습니다!
TOKENATTACHER.error.ElementAlreadyAttach: Element already in chain of attachments. See console for more details.
TOKENATTACHER.error.ActorDataModelNeedsM: Token uses old data model. Please migrate it via 'Token Attacher GM Menu' in 'Module Settings' and try again!
TOKENATTACHER.error.MigrationErrorScene: Migration error on scene {scene}. See console for more informations.
TOKENATTACHER.error.QuickEditNotFinished: Token Attacher Quick Edit Mode was not ended and auto save didn't finish. Your last changes won't be saved.
TOKENATTACHER.error.PostProcessingNotFin: Token Attacher's Post Processing is not finished. If you switched the scene before then you need to use the (TA)Delete missing Links Macro.
TOKENATTACHER.info.SelectionSaved: 나중에 연결할 수 있도록 선택된 개체가 저장되었습니다.
TOKENATTACHER.info.MigrationInProgress: Data migration to {version} in progress. This will take some time and open all your scenes. Please be patient.
TOKENATTACHER.info.DataModelMergedTo: 데이터 마이그레이션이 완료되었습니다. 문제가 생길 경우 데이터가 손실되었는지 걱정하지 말고 디스코드에서 제작자에게 문의하십시오. 새 데이터 모델 버전: {version}
TOKENATTACHER.info.DragSelectElements: Use layer select tool to select elements on all layers to attach now!
TOKENATTACHER.info.PostProcessingFinishe: Token Atacher's Post Processing is finished. You can use the prefab now.
TOKENATTACHER.info.PastedAndAttached: Pasted elements. Please wait for post processing to finish...
TOKENATTACHER.button.select: Select tool for attaching elements on all layers
TOKENATTACHER.button.gmMenu.CompendiumsM: Migrate all Actor Compendiums that have attached Elements
TOKENATTACHER.button.gmMenu.ExportActors: Open Export Actors to JSON Dialog
TOKENATTACHER.button.gmMenu.ResetMigrati: Reset Datamodel and force restart automatic Migration
